description: This source file provides utilities for managing DHCPv4 client operations, including fetching DHCP options, starting and stopping DHCP clients, and handling DHCP option lists. It interacts with underlying platform-specific implementations, system configurations, and external DHCP client programs.

methods.name: int get_dhcpv4_opt_list(dhcp_params * params,dhcp_opt_list ** req_opt_list,dhcp_opt_list ** send_opt_list)
methods.description: Fetches DHCP request and send options list based on system configuration and platform HAL, populating provided lists.

methods.name: pid_t start_dhcpv4_client(dhcp_params * params)
methods.description: Initializes DHCP options, invokes platform-specific DHCP client start routines, and manages resources.

methods.name: int stop_dhcpv4_client(dhcp_params * params)
methods.description: Stops the DHCP client associated with the given interface parameters, using platform-specific routines.

ctags.name: get_dhcpv4_opt_list
ctags.pattern: /^static int get_dhcpv4_opt_list (dhcp_params * params, dhcp_opt_list ** req_opt_list, dhcp_opt_li/
